name: @carbon/ai-chat-examples-demo
description: A demo and testing framework using @carbon/ai-chat as a React component.

scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build index.html --public-url ./ --no-cache
scripts.analyze: npm run clean && parcel build index.html --public-url ./ --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer --no-cache

author: IBM Corp
